name: Ruan YiFeng
description: 阮一峰，70后，英文名Frank。他原是上海财经大学世界经济博士研究生。主要研究宏观金融、货币政策与美国经济。于2008年6月获得博士学位。目前在上海一所当地大学（上海金融学院 国际经贸学院）任教。他本人也是一名IT技术人员，主要关注网站制作，并且对免费软件有着坚定不移的信念。除了写博客以外，他还有三个网站：微趣、Italo Calvino in China和读书公园。

name: Yehuda Katz
description: Yehuda Katz is a member of the Ember.js, Ruby on Rails and jQuery Core Teams; his 9-to-5 home is at the startup he founded, Tilde Inc.. There he works on Skylight, the smart profiler for Rails, and does Ember.js consulting﻿. He is best known for his open source work, which also includes Thor and Handlebars. He travels the world doing open source evangelism and web standards work.
